message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. In fact, I've sold 1 out of 3 products so far, and 1 of them was high-quality. I'm confident that this product will meet your expectations, and I'm happy to offer it to you at this price. What do you think? Will you take a chance on this product?
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on your positive feedback and the fact that one out of three products was high-quality, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $100.
